item.title: std::vector | Vector in C++
item.description: In C++, std::vector is a dynamic array provided by the Standard Template Library (STL). Unlike traditional arrays with fixed size, a vector can grow or shrink at runtime, making it one of the most widely used containers in modern C++ programming. .youtube-thumbnail-container { position: relative; display: inline-block; max-width: 100%; cursor: pointer; overflow: hidden; } .youtube-thumbnail-container img.thumbnail { display: block; width: 100%; height: auto; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .
